results.content: Some good info in this course but, if scripted, it could have been delivered in half the time.

results.content: great course, the teacher is a very expert guy, funny also. I recomend 100% this course
results.content_html: great course, the teacher is a very expert guy, funny also. I recomend 100% this course

results.content:
I enjoyed the course and it was full of useful information which will allow anyone to set up their own cloud hosting within 2 hours.

It could be improved by having the view of what Zachary, the instructor is working on at full screen instead of a window on top of his desk top. This would help make following easier and clearer.

A really good introduction and I'd give 5 stars if the presentation on screen was bigger. The addition of downloadable cheat sheets to follow along with would be a really valuable addition.
